column1: Turns out Trump who praised Chinese President Xi and his handling of the Coronavirus 37 times in the first 4 months of the pandemic has a secret bank account in China and paid hundreds of thousands in taxes—to China—while paying zip here. https://t.co/qEemo1RxIj

A herd immunity “strategy” for COVID-19 is a death sentence for millions more Americans. The White House should halt pursuit of this fantasy & embrace public health measures to stop disease spread like face masks contact tracing & social distancing: https://t.co/zks9RGfkJH https://t.co/hWEQKcaisN

The self-proclaimed “wartime president” just went AWOL pulling the plug on COVID-19 relief. After paying dirt in federal taxes for decades and taking millions in free health care from taxpayers he just gave us all the finger. My statement: https://t.co/43hSDopQZs https://t.co/xJqpCQCsZW

With daily reports of new infections among political press & custodial staff the COVID-19 outbreak at the White House is out of control. WH must take steps now to stop the spread of the disease to people who work for or around POTUS: https://t.co/c1sa4a1YCe https://t.co/NViDciTGYe

When I questioned Azar about White House statements of support for letting COVID-19 wash over the population to create “herd immunity” he said he isn't a physician or epidemiologist. But he is Secretary of HHS & must denounce this deadly policy as it gains traction in the Admin: https://t.co/x1HO7XpJEY

I hope for a swift recovery for all infected with COVID-19 including POTUS & FLOTUS. We know from public health experts that face masks save lives. HHS Sec. Azar just testified that mask wearing is an important public health tool contradicting Trump's harsh criticism of masks: https://t.co/iQM6UINH5R

Domestic violence and poverty are both on the rise during the COVID-19 pandemic. We urge IRS to issue missing stimulus payments to domestic violence survivors whose abusive partners stole or withheld these payments. My bipartisan letter with 100+ colleagues: https://t.co/PhEmBhOR7c https://t.co/Xxh9SgQ0KH

As we stand together against #COVID19 and government indifference we renew our commitment to defending human rights around the world and spreading peace among nations on this International #PeaceDay. https://t.co/h8ddy1x0oh

Proud to be a cosponsor of @RepGraceMeng’s Resolution condemning all forms of anti-Asian sentiment that have occurred since the outbreak of #COVID19. We stand strong with the AAPI community in denouncing this disgusting racism & xenophobia. https://t.co/zReWkcdYlt

This National #RecoveryMonth we face multiple crises: the #COVID19 pandemic economic crisis & an addiction epidemic that is claiming thousands of lives each year. I’m standing with my colleagues to support Americans in recovery & to #EndTheStigma surrounding mental health. https://t.co/ahcG419qPf

As we mark the start of #HispanicHeritageMonth we celebrate not only the vibrant culture & contributions of Latinx communities but also their resilience against #COVID19 health & financial shocks. This #HHM let us act to address serious health gaps & economic disparities. https://t.co/cJd5NwJQnX

Thanks @kerrywashington for your powerful testimony in our @COVIDOversight hearing on the 2020 Election. America has a shortage of poll workers in the #COVID19 pandemic. Young ppl can #HelpAmericaVote by signing up to be poll workers on Nov. 3: https://t.co/3yCsDTSJ1P https://t.co/X4TlEocpyN

An additional 1.2 million children under the age of 5 could die this year worldwide because they cannot access essential health services in the #COVID19 pandemic. We need real U.S. leadership for global maternal and child health programs to #SaveMomsAndKids. https://t.co/FVCVKjJM76

Thrilled to feature Leocadie Estelle Ganga as this week's #MD08 Local Hero! A @USPS letter carrier in Silver Spring who never misses a day of work she makes sure mail is delivered on time & is on the frontlines of our battle against #COVID19. https://t.co/5nHfFObmmF

Even as we battle COVID-19 we continue the fight against opioids. I join my MD colleagues in applauding this nearly $4.6 million in federal funding for @MD_Labor to combat the opioid crisis through job training & recovery services. https://t.co/G1LP0c03RR https://t.co/tyNHoD67HT

State & local governments face a $1 trillion budget shortfall as they struggle with the COVID-19 public health catastrophe & urgently need more federal aid. Glad that Sec. Mnuchin acknowledged the need for more state & local financial aid during our @COVIDOversight hearing: https://t.co/Rponf7r9iS

The link between COVID-19 & severe chronic illnesses must be aggressively scrutinized by the medical community. My bill would fund research of post-viral chronic neuroimmune diseases like ME/CFS. See if your Representative is a cosponsor here: https://t.co/x9irADo3UO https://t.co/sqbEITtCt9

Grateful for the around-the-clock work of my District Office staff and our amazing District Director Kathleen Connor described as “The Fixer” by @Bethesda_Mag for her commitment to get our people through the COVID-19 crisis. https://t.co/uVUjnPQsXO https://t.co/HZtZGrqUF8

Frontline workers shouldn’t be called heroes and then turned into martyrs. Like nurses bus drivers letter carriers and first responders workers need unions raises and a real plan to defeat COVID-19. https://t.co/ytnTB7UMiv

Today's 2:30 p.m. panel is an excellent opportunity to learn about the link between #COVID19 and ME/CFS and the urgency of my legislation to address the predicted rise in these chronic illnesses: https://t.co/V2uDeHkmKL https://t.co/LzdRwa2bgw

Check out this excellent @cnn piece on the urgent need to address the predicted rise in chronic fatigue syndrome cases linked to COVID-19 and why I recently introduced HR 7057 to provide funding for research into ME/CFS: https://t.co/z02Xe4cPYV

Check out this @VanityFair article on how the Admin almost had a plan-from Jared Kushner!-but it was rejected because they thought COVID-19 was a “blue state” disease & it would be better to blame the governors than to be responsible for a real strategy. https://t.co/tTbHB35xJu

In today’s extraordinary @COVIDOversight hearing with Dr. Fauci on why America still has no plan to defeat the disease I devoted my first round of Q&A time to debunking Trump’s disinformation and GOP propaganda about COVID-19. Watch: https://t.co/KvjMSmZBXe
Watch our upcoming @COVIDOversight hearing live here starting at 9am: https://t.co/ojwRPmgPgG https://t.co/aV4C8BwFlA

With no COVID-19 cure in sight Attorney General Barr worked with Trump and right-wing protesters to disarm the states of the only weapon we have against this disease—public health measures—and now we are paying the price. My remarks in today’s @HouseJudiciary hearing: https://t.co/plOMuTxVXk

Reminder: Entries to our 8th District Homemade Mask Contest are due TODAY Monday July 27th! Show your creative skills and personal style while doing your part to slow the spread of COVID-19 in our state: https://t.co/CScPOsVvmm

The need for robust telehealth services is soaring in this epidemic & we must guarantee safe & high-quality healthcare for all. That’s why I joined my colleagues in supporting critical legislation to fund the @FCC #COVID19 Telehealth Program. https://t.co/xvexnI9CQa https://t.co/3LvoRqCFAV

Delighted to feature More Than Masks as this week's #MD08 Local Hero! Listen to Pamela Fields & Roz Grigsby talk about this amazing program to distribute thousands of face masks by a juggler on a unicycle & raise #COVID19 relief funds for food kitchens! https://t.co/UmPUHLmlM9

Starr County TX is so overwhelmed by COVID-19 cases that it has formed an “ethics committee” to “screen all patients for survival potential” at the door. Donald Trump’s GOP has become the official party of death panels. https://t.co/ZhndZkJNf1

ICYMI: I launched an #MD08 Homemade Mask Contest! Show your creative skills and personal style while doing your part to slow the spread of #COVID19 in our state. Enter by July 27: https://t.co/m1XTbybB4d https://t.co/l3D6Q2ZUnU

Instead of sending $740 billion to the Pentagon Congress should be spending where resources are most needed—on battling the #COVID19 pandemic & helping Americans recover from this staggering public health & economic crisis. It's past time to focus on our real security interests. https://t.co/4o9Jv7Q9XB

NEW: We just launched an #MD08 Homemade Mask Contest! Show your creative skills and personal style while doing your part to slow the spread of #COVID19 in our state. Enter by July 27: https://t.co/Km2Tx3zCoF https://t.co/te7UloaMTF

With a second COVID-19 wave anticipated this fall remote voting could provide us with a secure transparent & reliable way to conduct legislative business and ensure that we are all able to represent our constituents effectively: https://t.co/GCN6YkLPyH https://t.co/bLMNyA3U1o

My MD colleagues & I are urging @HHSGov to extend the COVID-19 public health emergency which is set to expire in just a few days on July 25. We must ensure that MD continues to receive critical resources & support while the pandemic rages on. https://t.co/actuS262kL https://t.co/IRycWTnX7i

Today’s @COVIDOversight hearing dispelled the false choice between public health & the economy. Putting public health first with investments in wide-scale testing contact tracing & PPE will lead to quicker economic recovery and avoid massive shutdowns in the future. https://t.co/0daql5gosm https://t.co/sBEzFxkSqf

The Administration has done almost nothing to stop the spread of #COVID19 but is now working overtime to stop the spread of accurate data about it. We’re calling on the Admin to immediately rescind its guidance to send #COVID19 hospital data directly to HHS instead of @CDCgov. https://t.co/iRvoZIgNzO

The polluters who run the Administration are using the #COVID19 crisis to gut #NEPA—a bedrock environmental law. This rollback paves the way for them to exploit marginalized communities jeopardize public health & trash our climate. We must stop this plunder of our environment: https://t.co/FANNRNT1Wx

NEW: We hosted a roundtable about food security during the #COVID19 crisis with @MannaFoodCenter CEO @jacqdecarlo @CrossroadsNtwk Executive Director Lauren Goldberg and Tom Farquhar a farmer who established Sandy Spring Gardens. Check it out: https://t.co/qaaCEROCxB

The victims’ family begged to stop the execution. Epidemiologists warned it was dangerous for all involved. At least one worker assisting in the execution tested positive for COVID-19. https://t.co/7hYxpPbOOA

For months the Administration refused to respond to our inquiries about its lethal injection protocol. In the same period the Administration refused to develop a nationwide testing contact tracing & PPE coordination plan that might have prevented 135000 US COVID-19 deaths.
ICYMI: Delighted to host a roundtable discussion on the role of public #libraries during the #COVID19 crisis: https://t.co/pbyQUKbLbE https://t.co/hgYCpzLr7M

As America tops the world in coronavirus case counts and death counts Trump exacerbates his lethal incompetence ignorance and public health recklessness by withdrawing the U.S. from the World Health Organization turning us into a global medical pariah. https://t.co/wQqohRGPzi

In the #COVID19 pandemic we’ve seen a nationwide surge in build-it-yourself gun kits to create untraceable "ghost guns" that escape background checks. I just introduced legislation w/ @RepCicilline to stop the home manufacture of ghost guns: https://t.co/Ib9v3CDdNO

I joined my colleagues in introducing the Masks Work Act. As COVID-19 continues to spread we must ensure masks are accessible & affordable. This critical legislation enables mailing free cloth masks to all who request one & authorizes PSAs & research. https://t.co/Ozt73vN7GB

Delighted to introduce this week's #MD08 Local Hero - Frank Gilliard! Through his 35-year career with USPS he has become an expert resource on the mails for my constituents. He & other USPS workers are on the frontlines of the crisis & are critical to our fight against #COVID19. https://t.co/NUuSn6wuo3

Proud to join my colleagues in urging leadership to prioritize students' mental health in the next #coronavirus response package. We must ensure the availability of mental health services for all students through—and after—this pandemic. Our letter: https://t.co/aNrqztVylv https://t.co/JpqlUrRi6R

I stand in solidarity with @NationalNurses and nurses across America as they demand the protections they need to do their jobs safely in the #COVID19 pandemic. Stop the nonsense and get PPE to the frontlines immediately. #ProtectNurses

Greetings to all of our friends celebrating this 72nd anniversary of Yom Ha’Atzmaut Israel's Independence Day and in solidarity with Israel and all nations and peoples struggling for health safety peace and security in the face of the coronavirus crisis.

Today is #TrueColorsDay a day for raising awareness and taking action to end #LGBTQ youth homelessness. On this important day I want to thank the frontline workers who are making sure that all youth experiencing homelessness can stay healthy and safe during the COVID-19 crisis.

Yesterday ICE announced 96 new positive coronavirus cases – more than double the number on Friday morning - for a total of 220 confirmed cases among detainees. ICE admitted to me they have only tested 400 people just 1% of all detainees. This is deadly inaction.

On Friday I pressed ICE for its plan to stop a coronavirus outbreak in detention & called for release of non-violent detainees. After our briefing ICE announced 19 additional confirmed cases of COVID-19 18 of them in a single facility in Monroe LA.
